 1996-15431996-10-010,  JUS,  ,  , 
PrecisGranting of a LEAVE OF ABSENCE to the Hon. LOUISE ARBOUR, a Judge of the Court of Appeal of Ontario, from October 1, 1996 to October 31, 1996, in order to serve as Prosecutor of the International Tribunal for the Prosecution of Persons Responsible for Serious Violations of International Humanitarian Law Committed in the Territory of the Former Yugoslavia and the International Tribunal for Rwanda.
